title: S12 Ep182: What Is Believable? Oh, How Times Have Changed!
itunes:title: What Is Believable? Oh, How Times Have Changed!
description:
Author/Historian Ursula Bielski joins Beyond The Darkness to talk about how the paranormal field has changed in the ten years that Chicago Ghost Con has been in existence, and how people's beliefs and attitudes have changed. Specifically, where is the line between credible and ridiculous paranormal claims!

http://www.chicagoghosts.com/conference.html

Ursula's Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ursula.bielski
